data.title: Craig Oliver – POLITICO
data.meta_description: Latest news from POLITICO about Craig Oliver
data.text:
How to survive a prime ministerial broadcast round

Every big foreign trip includes back-to-back grillings — while an army of pool reporters tries not to miss a beat.

How to spin a referendum: The inside story of the Brexit campaign

Presented by Klarna

How the Brexit referendum was spun and lost

5 years on from the Brexit referendum, two key figures in the Leave and Remain campaigns reflect on what happened, and how it could have been different.

Boris Johnson is far from alone in his reluctance to own mistakes

Leaders see little to gain from admitting errors.

UK looks to the White House with plan to televise press briefings

Plan is part of a wider shake-up to reduce the number of comms staff in the British civil service.

Theresa May appoints top allies to House of Lords

Former British prime minister rewards her most loyal political allies in resignation honors list.

How to handle the British media

David Cameron’s former spin chief Craig Oliver shares his insights from six years in Number 10.
